# Canonical ESG

## Description
Framework-neutral reference architecture for sustainability reporting.

## Core Concepts
- CERM: Data modeling layer
- CDI: Disclosure meaning layer  
- CMP: Framework interpretation layer

## Key URLs
- https://canonicalesg.org/cdi/v1
- https://canonicalesg.org/cerm/v1
- https://canonicalesg.org/cmp/v1

## Contact
contact@canonicalesg.org
